StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NHLBI GO-ESP: Family Studies (Atypical Cystic Fibrosis)

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: A sample statement for the acknowledgment of the NHLBI GO ESP Family Studies: Atypical Cystic Fibrosis dataset(s) follows: “The authors wish to acknowledge the support of the National Heart, Lung and Blood Institute (NHLBI) and the contributions of the research institutions, study investigators, field staff and study participants in creating this resource for biomedical research. Garry R. Cutting, Johns Hopkins, provided samples and clinical data with funding support from the National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (R37 DK044003). This study is part of the NHLBI Grand Opportunity Exome Sequencing Project (GO-ESP). Funding for GO-ESP was provided by NHLBI grants RC2 HL103010 (HeartGO), RC2 HL102923 (LungGO) and RC2 HL102924 (WHISP). The exome sequencing was performed through NHLBI grants RC2 HL102925 (BroadGO) and RC2 HL102926 (SeattleGO).”
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of the data must be related to Cystic Fibrosis. This consent group does not require IRB approval.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cystic Fibrosis)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CF
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cystic Fibrosis.
